/usr/bin/c++ CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/src/graphics/window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/src/math/mat4.cpp.o CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/src/math/vec2.cpp.o CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/src/math/vec3.cpp.o CMakeFiles/your_executable_name.dir/src/math/vec4.cpp.o -o your_executable_name  libglad.a
